The user and a teammate or more can team up and perform a special attack together on the opponent. Moves executed vary depending on the game.

== Trivia ==
* The opponent is damaged before the first hit is unleashed like with a majority of neutral specials that require an initial blow.

[[es:Técnica Secreta de Combinación]]
